dialogue.text: Like, seriously! What’s even the point of a Christmas party without Sensei?! He’s like, the only reason I get all dressed up and go to those in the first place!
Hey, remember back when you had a life {i}without{/i} everything having to be about that guy? Those sure were the days.
Also, the hell you on about with “gettin’ dressed up?” Because I know you ain’t talkin’ about that skanky-ass Santa costume you keep stuffed in the closet 364 days out of the year.
That’s {i}exactly{/i} the costume I’m talking about. And if it weren’t for Ami, I’d be wearing it again right now. Unless I’ve gained weight.

Have I gained weight? Is that why Sensei’s gone? Did he disappear because he didn’t have the heart to tell me and now Ami is helping him stay off the grid so I can’t learn the truth and win him back? Huh?
You know, don’t you? You’re keeping something hidden from me. I can tell.
Big sis, Chika! Can Chinami open another present?!
Of course, my precious little angel! Chinami can do whatever she wants because Chinami is a good girl who would never do anything to make her sister sad! I love you!
Wahoo! Material goods!
So, on a scale of one to ten, where do you think you’d rank yourself right now in terms of utter insanity?
This many.
Aight. I think it might be time to take you to the doctor.
You’re right. But if my lobotomy fails and I’m put into a coma, just pull the plug and take care of Chinami yourself. I trust you.
I meant for like...brain shit, Chika. Whatever {i}this{/i} is ain’t healthy.

Yes, Yumi! I’m well aware! If it was healthy, I wouldn’t be screaming like this and gaining weight and losing sleep and screaming and...did I mention gaining weight?! God, how bad is it?! Just tell me!
You look exactly the fu...frickin’ same as always. Only difference is you finally went back to your natural hair color.
Oh god! It’s the hair, isn’t it?! That’s why he left!
Bitch, he ain’t even seen it yet.
And he probably never will...
Chika, the dude ain’t tryin’ to get away from you. He’s just...all messed up in the head. It’s probably like when I ran away for a while and he just needs some time to reset or something.

But {i}why?{/i} I don’t even know what happened! It’s like, Halloween came and all of a sudden he was just {i}gone.{/i} And we all saw him leave with Ami that night, so it had to be something she did, right?
Frick if I know. Maybe he {i}also{/i} beat the shit outta Nodoka and just none of us were around to see it.
Wish I was, though. That sounds hilarious.
Yumi, I’m being serious. I’m starting to get really worried.
You said that same exact thing after he was gone for literally one day.
Yeah, but now it’s {i}justified.{/i} This isn’t normal. And all of us know it isn’t normal, yet no one’s been able to do anything about it and he’s still {i}not here.{/i}
I...ain’t really sure what you want me to tell you, Chika.

I just know it ain’t good for you to keep freakin’ out like this. You’re gonna give yourself an aneurysm and then I really {i}will{/i} have to take care of the twerp on my own. And I ain’t ready to be a single mom.
What if he never comes back, Yumi? What if him and Ami just...up and leave?
And go where? City’s closed.
Yeah, but the city’s {i}big.{/i} And Sensei is like, super charismatic and hard-working and awesome, so he’d be able to find another job {i}easily!{/i} He doesn’t {i}need{/i} to be a teacher.
You know, if the lobotomy thing and the crazy eyes didn’t already put you over the edge, that “charismatic and hard-working” comment would’ve. Dude’s a bum, Chika. You know it.
Nuh-uh. He’s just been away for so long by now that you’re not remembering him correctly.
You sure it ain’t the other way around?
Is this really how my first relationship is going to end? With me never getting any closure and my boyfriend just straight up vanishing? Is my life really {i}that{/i} tragic? It can’t be, right?
Like, something’s gotta work out eventually. Doesn’t it? Why can’t it be this? Why can’t it be him?
Chika...I know this ain’t what you wanna hear. But as your friend, I’ve gotta be honest.
Maybe fallin’ for a dude in his thirties while you’re still in high school wasn’t the best bet in terms of findin’ something that’ll “work out.” You know what I mean?
Age is just a number, Yumi.
Seriously? Around the kid?
Chinami, you didn’t hear that.
Chinami didn’t hear anything....
Listen, I ain’t sayin’ he’s never comin’ back. I obviously don’t know him as well as you, but I don’t think he’s the type to just...leave all this shit behind, you know?
But he’s done it once before. With Noriko. Which is probably why she’s handling this so well while {i}I’m{/i} drowning in misery.
Pinkie ain’t doin’ well at all. Girl is doubling down on all that righteous nonsense she’s always pushin’ and I caught her cryin’ in the bathroom just last week.
The one near the gym?
Yeah, the one near the-
Wait, why do {i}you{/i} know that?

That’s the crying bathroom. It used to just be the gym bathroom, but our class took control of it in early November and repurposed it so we’d have a safe space to think about death and other sad stuff.
Man, I can’t help but feel like a lotta this shit would be totally avoidable if we had an actual class counselor instead of the world’s most desirable predator.

You want to talk about “predators?” Fine. Let’s talk about Ami — because there isn’t a doubt in my mind that this is all her fault. There’s no way she isn’t the reason Sensei’s still absent from school.
Heh? Don’t just assume I {i}want{/i} to talk about them because I-
Ten thousand yen says that clingy psycho niece of his is taking advantage of Sensei’s kindness as we speak.
She’s been doing it forever and I’m tired of giving her the benefit of the doubt just because I assumed making her like me would ultimately make it easier for me to marry Sensei after college.
But you know what, Yumi? {i}Fuck{/i} Ami. The next time I see her, I’m getting some answers — even if I have to squeeze them out of her damn neck.
Woah.
Big sis Chika said the forbidden word! Now Child Services is going to come and take Chinami away!
Chinami, go take a bath. Big sis Chika needs to vent to Yumi or she’s going to pull all of her hair out and then she’ll be bald and ugly {i}and{/i} fat.
But-
Chinami. No more presents until you take a bath. I mean it.
Aww...rats.
Now...I ain’t the biggest fan of mini-Sensei either. But what makes you think she’d be the one somehow responsible for all this bullshit?
Were you not paying attention earlier! She left the Halloween party with Sensei and nobody has seen him since. She obviously did something.
That ain’t true. We saw him the day after Halloween, remember?
What? No. I don’t remember that at all. Stop making shit up just to throw a wrench in my theory. You always do that.
I’ve...literally never done that at any point ever. But we had school that day, Chika. I remember because I was actually there.
Well {i}I{/i} was obviously not there because that never happened.
The hell are you talking about? We even had that project thing where-
Where...
See? You can’t remember because it never {i}happened.{/i} If you’re going to make up stories like that, at least figure out the bullet-points before you start sharing them.
No, that’s...I can’t remember any of the details, but...I remember...
A-Anyway, what about the rest of his little squadron?
Cause I know for sure that Ponytail and Blondie have been goin’ over to his place since they follow mini-Sensei home whenever she {i}does{/i} come to school.
They {i}also{/i} left with him on Halloween. Sana too. I just left them out when I brought it up because Ami’s the one I trust the least.
That entire group is starting to piss me off, though. They’re definitely hiding something. But any time I’ve approached Ayane about it, she’s seemed like...genuinely upset.
So either Ami’s fucking {i}her{/i} over too or Ayane is going to win an Oscar one day. Maya and Sana I just...don’t even see being attracted to Sensei, as crazy as that sounds.
Is that really enough reason to wring her neck, though? Cause, speakin’ from experience, that’s a thing you’ve gotta be ready to deal with the fallout for.
Honestly? If getting expelled is all that would come of it, yeah. I {i}do{/i} think that’s enough of a reason.
I’ve ignored Ami’s fucking...creepy incestuous passes at Sensei for way too long because I know he’d never go through with any of it.
And if something actually happened that {i}did{/i} fuck him up mentally...and {i}she{/i} seized that opportunity to take what we {i}all{/i} know she wants from him...
I will fucking kill her, Yumi. I mean it.
Chika, you ain’t {i}killing{/i} anybody. And gettin’ expelled from school is gonna fuck with your future.
You’ve got a little sister to take care of. You can’t be doin’ shit that {i}I{/i} would do. You’re better than that. You’ve {i}always{/i} been better than that.
Yumi, let’s be real for a second. Getting expelled from high school won’t really do {i}anything{/i} to me or my future.
I don’t have the money for college. And I was already considering getting my GED that year I left to focus on Chinami. Hell, I’m lucky they let me come back in the first place.
Maybe if my mom was still here, things would be different. Maybe I’d be able to...I don’t know- work harder in school and...bust my ass for a scholarship or something.
But I don’t have the time for that while raising her with you. Neither one of us is...good enough at {i}anything{/i} to...{i}reach for the skies{/i} like Nodoka or Makoto...
Plus, I’ve been making good money at the maid cafe. Especially with all the extra hours I’ve been picking up with Ami away.
Like, just look at all the presents I was able to get for Chinami this year. She’s having an {i}actual{/i} Christmas for once.
I did that without even {i}finishing{/i} high school. Which means there are avenues for me to take care of us {i}without{/i} having to spend more time on my education.
If anything, school is like...a {i}hindrance{/i} right now. Because I know I could be making even {i}more{/i} if I didn’t have to spend like forty hours a week there. You know what I mean?
I mean...yeah...
All that makes really good sense to me, Chika. Especially as someone who was thinkin’ the same way just a little while ago. Difference is that you actually {i}are{/i} good at shit, though.
And I don’t want you throwin’ away a chance at a better future for the sake of some dude who, again, don’t wanna say this — might not {i}be{/i} who you want him to be.
I just don’t know what else to do, Yumi...
I feel so fucking...{i}helpless.{/i} Like, she won’t even let me inside their house. I can’t even say I miss him. And he hasn’t responded to a single text in two months. I’m out of options here.
You can always {i}wait,{/i} dude. We ain’t got the faintest fuckin’ idea what’s goin’ on with your creepy ass {i}boyfriend.{/i} And attackin’ his damn niece could make that even worse.

Like, the hell would you gain if you beat the shit out of her and she straight up just...continued to not tell you anything? Cause the best case scenario there would be her leavin’ the cops out of it.
Do you think...the cops would actually do anything if we tried to get them involved {i}now?{/i} Like, couldn’t they go do a welfare check or something?
Kumon-mi’s cops? You kidding? Force is so thin with all the dudes up there in space that you can’t even get ‘em to show up for a robbery. How the hell do you think I landed so many TVs?
I thought you got those on the side of the road when people were throwing them away?
Yeah, cause that’s what I wanted you to think.
Oh god. I’m harboring a criminal.
Listen, if you want {i}my{/i} advice...try makin’ the guy a fuckin’ card or something.
A...card?

Yeah. You know how in movies and shit, people will band together and make a card for somebody who’s goin’ through a tough time and then, like...that person’s suddenly cured of cancer or whatever? Do that.
Are you telling me Sensei has cancer?
No, you fucking moron. I’m telling you that, like...even if the dude’s a heartless prick who preys on teenagers, he’d probably feel {i}something{/i} getting a card like that.
Even if you all write simple shit like “Yo, miss you” or whatever. It ain’t a foolproof plan by any means, but it’s better than beatin’ the shit outta somebody, I think. And I speak from experience.
How would we get it to him, though? Because we’d have to give it to Ami and I refuse to believe she wouldn’t just tear it up or set it on fire to make sure he keeps thinking of her and her alone.
Now, {i}that{/i} I don’t know. And I’ve gotta start gettin’ ready for a thing, so I can’t brainstorm now. But I’ll text you if I think of something.
A {i}thing?{/i}
Don’t worry about it.
Oh my god! You’re going to the Christmas party, aren’t you?!
I literally just told you not to worry about it.
{i}Big sis, Chika! Chinami’s been waiting a long time for the water to get hot, but it’s still cold! And she doesn’t want to take a cold bath because she’ll get a cough and then die!{/i}
Fuck...That’s the fifth time this month.
You forget to pay the bill or some shit?
No, I think the boiler is busted.
Chinami, just take a bath tomorrow! I’m sorry for making you wait in there so long!
{i}That’s okay! Chinami played with her imaginary friend, Thomas!{/i}
Please don’t take imaginary boys into the bathroom with you, Chinami!
Need me to go knock some sense into your landlord? Or would you rather get some of that crazy bitch energy out and fight him yourself?
Don’t worry about it. I’ve got another Christmas present for {i}both{/i} of you that should be ready any day now. And when it is, we’ll have all the hot water we’ll ever need.
You’re gonna fuckin’ burn this place to the ground, aren’t you?
Yumi, if I don’t see my boyfriend soon, I am going to burn this entire fucking {i}city{/i} to the ground.
And on that note, I’m out. Text me if you start thinking more about death and other sad stuff or whatever.
Got it. Tell everybody at the party who doesn’t also love Sensei that I said hi.
What’s that? You want me to talk to absolutely no one? Got it. Later.
Later, Yumi.
And thank you...
{i}Chika’s affection has decayed by 10!{/i}
{i}Yumi’s affection has decayed by 10!{/i}
{i}Chinami’s affection has decayed by 10!{/i}
